Library membership is free - join online or visit your local library to sign up.
properties.title: Box Library

properties.address: The Parade, Box, Nr Corsham, Wiltshire SN18 8NX
properties.description: Individual comfy chairs, space is heated to 18 degrees, tea, coffee and biccies with hot soup on alternate Thursdays. 9.30 to noon or 14:30 on Thursdays: Hearty soup lunches on alternate Thursdays. Services on 2nd,3rd & 4th Sundays, Check the website for dates
properties.title: Box Methodist Church

properties.address: 88 Station Road, Yate, South Glos BS37 4PH
properties.description: We are a community run cafe open Wednesday's between 1pm and 3pm. All are welcome. We serve hot drinks and cake, and soup and a roll during the colder months. There are puzzles and games for any children who visit and you are welcome to borrow a book from our little library shelves. We regularly have folk sharing skills, for example, during the last few months we have painted rocks, made Christmas decorations, and learned how to make some stunning mosaics. We've also had a local choir visit and have other exciting things planned.

properties.description: Everyone welcome we provide a warm welcome to anyone looking for somewhere to spend some time with others in a warm and friendly environment. We don't charge for our hot drinks and we also serve fresh homemade soup and a roll.
properties.title: souper friday

properties.address: Chipping Sodbury Baptist Church, Chipping Sodbury, South Gloucestershire BS37 6AH
properties.description: The Oasis at CSBC is a community wellbeing space where everyone is welcome. It is hosted by Chipping Sodbury Baptist Church (CSBC). Come in for a cuppa and a chat, share a hobby, join an activity and perhaps make a new friend. A variety of activities take place on a regular basis throughout the week/month - please see our website for more details. NB The Oasis is closed on Bank Holidays and between Christmas and New Year.
